Add a `JoinApplication` model and review workflow for applicants.

Tasks:
- Implement `JoinApplication` model (name, email, batch, motivation, interests, is_approved, is_rejected)
- Add form/endpoint for applicants to submit applications
- Add admin views to approve/reject and list pending applications
- Notify user on approval/rejection

Related issue: https://github.com/Atostrain445/skills-integrate-mcp-with-copilot/issues/12
